# Generate protein search database

```{bash}
sbatch scripts/submit_comet.sh
```

```{bash}
ls data/tc-1154/*.pin | xargs -I {} tail -n +2 {} > pooled.pin
```

```{bash}
percolator pooled.pin > pooled.tsv
```

```{python}
import polars as pl
```


